articles.title: TAF15 amyloid filaments in frontotemporal lobar degeneration - Nature.com
articles.description: Cryogenic electron microscopy structures of amyloid filaments extracted from patient brains reveal that the protein TAF15 forms filaments that characterize certain cases of frontotemporal lobar degeneration.
